name: AudioUnitParameterUnit
desc: The unit-of-measure for an audio unit parameter.

items.name: case absoluteCents
items.desc: An absolute unit of measure for the musical pitch of a note.

items.name: case BPM
items.desc: A whole-number unit of measure for musical tempo, representing beats per minute.

items.name: case beats
items.desc: A time unit of measure in musical beats.

items.name: case boolean
items.desc: A Boolean-like unit of measure.

items.name: case cents
items.desc: A logarithmic unit of measure for a musical interval between two notes.

items.name: case customUnit
items.desc: A custom unit of measure.

items.name: case decibels
items.desc: A logarithmic unit of measure representing the ratio between two audio levels.

items.name: case degrees
items.desc: An angular degree unit of measure.

items.name: case equalPowerCrossfade
items.desc: An audio power unit of measure.

items.name: case generic
items.desc: A generic unit of measure.

items.name: case hertz
items.desc: A hertz unit of measure.

items.name: case indexed
items.desc: An indexed unit of measure.

items.name: case linearGain
items.desc: A linear unit of measure representing the difference between two audio levels.

items.name: case midiController
items.desc: A whole-number unit of measure corresponding to standard MIDI control numbers.

items.name: case midiNoteNumber
items.desc: A whole-number unit of measure corresponding to audio frequency.

items.name: case meters
items.desc: A distance unit of measure, corresponding to meters.

items.name: case milliseconds
items.desc: A time unit of measure representing milliseconds.

items.name: case mixerFaderCurve1
items.desc: An audio power unit of measure.

items.name: case octaves
items.desc: A relative unit of measure for the musical interval between two notes.

items.name: case pan
items.desc: An audio position unit of measure.

items.name: case percent
items.desc: A percentage unit of measure.

items.name: case phase
items.desc: An angular degree unit of measure.

items.name: case rate
items.desc: A multiplication factor unit of measure.

items.name: case ratio
items.desc: A unitless ratio unit of measure.

items.name: case relativeSemiTones
items.desc: A relative unit of measure for a musical interval between two notes.

items.name: case sampleFrames
items.desc: A sample-frame-count unit of measure.

items.name: case seconds
items.desc: A whole-seconds unit of measure, indicating either absolute or relative time.
